summary: This is an email chain from August 21, 2020, regarding the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) draft report on the USAO-SDFL's 2006-2008 handling of the Jeffrey Epstein matter. The correspondence involves scheduling a discussion about the report and notifying the recipient that the draft will be provided to US Attorney Strauss for review.

persons.name: Strauss
persons.context: US Attorney who will receive the OPR draft report on the Epstein matter for review and comment.

events.title: USAO-SDFL Handling of Epstein Matter
events.description: The period under review by the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida's handling of the Jeffrey Epstein case.

events.title: OPR Draft Report Transmittal
events.description: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) is preparing to send its draft report on the USAO-SDFL's 2006-2008 handling of the Epstein matter to US Attorney Strauss.

keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) prepared a draft report investigating the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida's handling of the Jeffrey Epstein matter from 2006 to 2008.
The draft report was to be transmitted to US Attorney Strauss for review and comment, with instructions for it to be closely held.
The correspondence indicates an internal DOJ review of prosecutorial conduct in the earlier Epstein case, occurring in 2020.
